title: Should the sunnah prayers of Fajr, Maghrib & Isha be prayed loudly by women? #Assim assim al hakeem
transcript: should we pray the sunna prayers of M Isa and F loudly for women I don't understand the word should we pray the sun prayers of M is and F loudly for no the sunah prayers of and f as well as the rest of the Sunan of the F prayers are to be recited silently whether for men or for women because this is the Sunnah this is how the prophet used to pray them
